com.acmetelecom

Class BillingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acmetelecom.BillingSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBillingSystem

    public class BillingSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBillingSystem
    High-level billing system logic, concerned with forwarding call events and creating customer bills.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BillingSystem

        public BillingSystem()
        Constructor. To ensure rest of system continues to work without changes.

      • BillingSystem

        public BillingSystem(ICallEventManager callEventManager,
             ICallCostCalculator callCostCalculator,
             IBillGenerator billGenerator,
             com.acmetelecom.customer.CustomerDatabase customerDatabase,
             IClock clock)
        Constructor. To be used for dependency injection.
        Parameters:
        callEventManager - The call event manager to use when handling call events.
        callCostCalculator - The call cost calculator to use when generating bills.
        billGenerator - The bill generator to use to generate bills.
        customerDatabase - The customer database to refer to for customer information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of arguments are null.
